languages.text: {n}Огнеголосый уповает на болтуна, что не хранит тайн и боится боли. Ненадежный сосуд плох, чтобы сберечь секрет, но хорош, чтобы расплескать его. Через него я буду шептать врагу ложь.{/n}

{n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Огнеголосый уповает на болтуна, что не хранит тайн и боится боли. Ненадежный сосуд плох, чтобы сберечь секрет, но хорош, чтобы расплескать его. Через него я буду шептать врагу ложь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}
{n}Flaming Heart relies on a chatterer that keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for secrecy, but good for breaking it. Through him I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Flammende Stimme ist auf einen Plauderer angewiesen, jemanden, der keine Geheimnisse wahrt und der Schmerzen fürchtet. Ein unzuverlässiges Gefäß ist schlecht, um Geheimnisse zu lagern, aber gut, um sie zu vergießen. Durch ihn werde ich dem Feind Lügen zuflüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Flammende Stimme ist auf einen Plauderer angewiesen, jemanden, der keine Geheimnisse wahrt und der Schmerzen fürchtet. Ein unzuverlässiges Gefäß ist schlecht, um Geheimnisse zu lagern, aber gut, um sie zu vergießen. Durch ihn werde ich dem Feind Lügen zuflüstern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Voz Llameante también confía en un confidente, alguien que no guarda secretos y teme el dolor. Un receptáculo de poca confianza no sirve para guardar secretos, pero sí para revelarlos. A través de él, susurraré mentiras al enemigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voz Llameante también confía en un confidente, alguien que no guarda secretos y teme el dolor. Un receptáculo de poca confianza no sirve para guardar secretos, pero sí para revelarlos. A través de él, susurraré mentiras al enemigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}燃える声は秘密を持たず、痛みを恐れる話し手を頼りにしている。信頼できない器は秘密を守らせるには不向きだが、吐き出させるには適している。彼を通して、敵に嘘を囁くとしよう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}燃える声は秘密を持たず、痛みを恐れる話し手を頼りにしている。信頼できない器は秘密を守らせるには不向きだが、吐き出させるには適している。彼を通して、敵に嘘を囁くとしよう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}“烈焰之声”的线人是个滔滔不绝的人，这个人害怕痛苦，不会保守秘密。尽管这种不可靠的人无法守住秘密，但却很擅长泄露秘密。我可以通过他来向敌人低语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“烈焰之声”的线人是个滔滔不绝的人，这个人害怕痛苦，不会保守秘密。尽管这种不可靠的人无法守住秘密，但却很擅长泄露秘密。我可以通过他来向敌人低语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Timbre flamboyant fait confiance à un bavard incapable de garder les secrets, et qui, pour ne rien arranger, craint la douleur. Un réceptacle auquel on ne peut se fier est voué à tout dévoiler. Je me servirai de lui pour murmurer des mensonges à mes ennemis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alazlı Ses; sır saklamayı bilmeyip acıdan ödü kopan, çenesi düşük birine bel bağlıyor. Böylesine güvenilmez bir şahıs, sır saklamada kötü olsa da sır vermede iyi bir seçimdir. Onun aracılığıyla düşmanın kulağına yalanlar fısıldayacağım.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Flaming Voice relies on a talker, one who keeps no secrets and fears pain. An unreliable vessel is bad for holding secrets, but good for spilling them. Through him, I will whisper lies to the enemy.{/n}
